description.value: The bacallia regurgitates a portion of its stomach's contents as a ranged spit Strike that deals a base of @Damage[1d6[acid]] damage with a range increment of 10 feet. The damage is 2d6 for a mature bacallia and 3d6 for a specialized one. A living creature hit with this Strike is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical hit).
